data.title: Population Statistics, Charts, Map and Location
data.meta_description: Bern (Canton, Switzerland) with population statistics, charts, map and location.
data.text:
Contents: Subdivision

The population development in Bern as well as related information and services (Wikipedia, Google, images).

The icon links to further information about a selected division including its population structure (gender, age groups, age distribution, citizenship, country of birth).
